project.title: BiggPay

about.title: Focus on members
about.description: We are in this to delight our members. We maintain constant communication to understand their needs and wants.

about.title: Take ownership
about.description: We are passionate and proactive. We take ownership and prioritize the long term, not just our team or task.

about.title: Get stuff done
about.description: Time and resources are a constraint. We can only win if we are faster, more effective, and more agile than others.

about.title: Prioritize data
about.description: We are humble about our opinions and use data across our teams to make better decisions. We have deep respect for the security & privacy of members.

about.title: Enjoy the journey
about.description: We believe we can do our best work by supporting each other and seeking together to make our work engaging, fun, and enjoyable.

about.title: Support personal growth
about.description: We are committed to using our experience at work to support our own and each otherâ€™s personal growth journeys.

hero.title: BiggPay Network & Partner program
hero.intro: Join the BiggPay Network & Expand your Distributor Business & Earn Extra Income. BiggPay has always been Vocal for the Local shopkeepers. Through BiggPay, more than 4,00,000 retailers have served around 3 crore unique customers in 2,300+ cities. BiggPay has increased retailers monthly earning as well as customer's footfall.

list.title: BiggPay for Retails
list.intro: BiggPay has always been Vocal for the Local shopkeepers. Through BiggPay, more than 4,00,000 retailers have served around 3 crore unique customers in 2,300+ cities. BiggPay has increased retailers monthly earning as well as customer's footfall.

list.title: Become a true solution provider
list.intro: Become Aatma nirbhar Dukaandar and earn Rs.16,000 extra every month. Our Platform is Easy, Fast & Secure to use.

list.title: Free of cost services
list.intro: No charges to use BiggPay Service. Earn token on every transaction, which helps in boosting their earnings.

list.title: BiggPay for Distributors
list.intro: We at BiggPay intend to improve our distributors earning potential by enabling them to grow their business and make the best out of their retail network. It will help you make your daily business easy and effective.

hero.sub_title: Expand your business with our Services!
hero.title: All the services you need to run your business
hero.intro: A unique and powerful software suite to transform the way you work. Designed for businesses of all sizes, built by a company that values your privacy.

services.title: Banking
services.sub_title: We are providing banking facilities that simplify money transfers and recharges. Our services ensure secure transactions, quick processing, and easy management, allowing users to handle their financial needs conveniently and efficiently through user-friendly platforms.

list.title: Money Transfer
list.intro: We are proud to offer instant and secure payment solutions.Our customers can now perform instant money transfers through our portal, ensuring fast and reliable transactions.

list.title: Express Transfer
list.intro: This service enables money to be transferred rapidly, often within a few hours or even minutes, compared to traditional transfer methods that may take several days.

list.title: Super Transfer
list.intro: Service enables high-speed,high-value money transfer service that facilitates the rapid movement of large sums of money between accounts,often with additional features or higher priority.

list.title: AePS
list.intro: We provide AEPS facilities, allowing users to perform banking transactions like withdrawals, deposits, and balance checks easily from their mobile devices.

list.title: Nepal Transfer
list.intro: We offer Nepal transfer facilities, enabling users to send money quickly and securely to Nepal through a simple, convenient process.

list.title: CMS
list.intro: We offer cash management services, helping users easily track, manage, and control their money for better financial stability and planning.

list.title: UPI
list.intro: ImpsGuru brings you one more attractive option of increasing your options of accepting payments in the form of QR codes or UPI.

services.title: Bill Payments
services.sub_title: Bill Payments  services allows individuals to pay their bills through various methods, ensuring timely settlement of recurring charges.This services can be done via online banking, mobile apps, automated teller machines (ATMs), or in-person at payment centers.

list.title: Mobile Recharge
list.intro: Earn more by doing  Mobile recharges, Utility bill payments, for your customers easily and quickly of more than 150 companies.

list.title: DTH Recharge
list.intro: WithImpsGuru merchant app, choose from a variety of operators like Airtel DTH, Dish TV, Videocon D2h.

list.title: Electricity
list.intro: Our electricity facilities make it easy to pay bills online. Quick, secure payments and easy account management from anywhere.

list.title: Credit Card
list.intro: Our credit card facilities offer secure payments, easy account management, and convenient access, making transactions simple and efficient.

list.title: Gas Bill
list.intro: Our gas bill facilities provide easy online payments, secure transactions, and simple management, making it convenient to handle your bills.

services.title: BBPS
services.sub_title: BBPS simplifies paying bills by bringing many services into one platform. You can pay bills for electricity, water, and more using your bank's app, website, or at retail locations. It ensures secure and quick payments, updates your bill immediately, and provides instant confirmation, making managing your bills easy and efficient.

list.title: Electricity
list.intro: We offer online electricity bill payments, letting users manage bills easily, ensuring timely payments, and avoiding interruptions from home.

list.title: FASTag
list.intro: We provide FASTag facilities for simple, automatic toll payments and easy online account management, ensuring quick, contactless travel with no delays.

list.title: Gas Cylinder
list.intro: Our services provide simple online ordering and delivery tracking, ensuring a steady supply and hassle-free management from the comfort of home.

list.title: Mobile Postpaid
list.intro: Our mobile postpaid service allows users to pay monthly, view bills online, make secure payments, and easily track and manage their usage.

list.title: Mobile Prepaid
list.intro: This service lets users pay in advance, with easy top-ups, balance checks, and flexible plan management, all through a simple interface.

list.title: All
list.intro: Gone are the days when anyone used to stand in a long queue, waiting for hours just for filling their monthly bills namely Electricity, Water, Gas, etc .
